title: Did a lawmaker in Kentucky introduce a bill asking men to get permission from their wives to take the Viagra?
subtitle: Mary Le Marzien, also a registered nurse, made fun of having introduced "Tongue in tents 2016" legislation to protect these men from themselves.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The 2016 bill before the Kentucky Legislative Council would have required men to obtain their wives ' permission before obtaining a prescription for Viagra or other IUDs.
